jonathansiddharth wrote:
> Hi,
>         This alert/exception abruptly terminated my crawl job. Could
> someone tell me what it is and how it can be avoided?

The below is an old faithful.  See 
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1218961&group_id=73833&atid=539099.  
It rears its head from time to time but we've not been able to figure 
why it happens nor how to reliably reproduce.  I'm guessing if you crawl 
that same page again in wikipedia, you'll succeed (least it did just now 
for me when I tried it).  I'm surprised it terminated your crawl.  
Usually we just fail extraction on a particular page and just move to 
the next in the queue.

St.Ack
P.S. I've just added more logging around this exception.   Perhaps it'll 
turn up the needed clue.
